page.title: 20HOME LIFE
page.content: Food is bought and stored in different forms:_ frozen, dried, tinned, fresh, bottled.Food may be cooked by electric or gas cookers, or microwave oven.It can be boiled in a pan over heat. It can be cooked inside the oven,slowly for casseroling, quickly for roasting. Some foods can be cooked quickly under a grill or rotisserie.Some foods can be cooked quickly under a high pressure of steam.( pressure cooker) For convenience, people can buy ready to eat food from shops that sell fish and chips,Chinese food,Indian food,beefburgers and chicken.These are called "Take_aways".We eat our main dishes with a knife and fork,and our soups and puddings using a spoon.We drink from cups,mugs,and glasses.We eat at a table covered with a tablecloth.
